titles.title: A resolution supporting the designation of the week of September 22 through September 26, 2025, as "National Hazing Awareness Week".
A resolution supporting the designation of the week of September 22 through September 26, 2025, as "National Hazing Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
